name: inhale
content:
inhale verb
(BREATHE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ I or T ] to breathe air, smoke, or gas into your lungs: She flung open the window and inhaled deeply. She became ill shortly after inhaling the fumes. Compare
exhale formal

inhale verb
(EAT)
[ T ] US informal to eat something extremely fast: Tony inhaled his burger.
